about_the_game:
Are you ready to embark on the most epic, sarcastic, and carrot-filled adventure of your life? 🐇✨

I'm Astel, the most stylish, fastest, and funniest rabbit you'll ever meet. And no, that's not just talk.

I'm also the last hero of Carrotlandia, a magical place... until Morgathis cursed everything

Now, here I am, taking on an epic mission to save my home and my people. And you know what's best? You're coming with me!

6 amazing and challenging worlds to explore:

The starting point of our adventure. Here, you'll face Terrébio, the field's guardian.

A forest full of magic and mysteries. Face Melindra, the guardian of this territory.

A dark island filled with pirates. The boss here is the Cute Pirate and his sidekick, the Fat Pirate Turtle.

Welcome to the extreme cold! Face Frostark and his sidekick, the Ice Golem.

A deep cave full of dangers. The guardian of this world is Rochargon.

The final destination. A dark forest where everything culminates in the confrontation with Morgathis

I can throw fireballs, freeze enemies, create magic platforms in the air, float like a leaf, and much more.

Download now, grab your keyboard (or controller), and help me save Carrotlandia!

Are you ready to embark on the most epic, sarcastic, and carrot-filled adventure of your life? 🐇✨

Now, here I am, taking on an epic mission to save my home and my people. And you know what's best? You're coming with me!

name: The Adventures of Astel and the Dark Curse

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Adventures of Astel and the Dark Curse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-750 @ 2.67GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 ou superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 @ 2.67GHz | AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Join Astel, the boldest (and funniest) bunny in Cenourolândia, on a magical adventure! Face bizarre enemies, collect epic powers, and save your village from a dark curse. What are you waiting for? Jump in and explore this incredible journey!
supported_languages:
Portuguese - Brazil*, English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
